generated_description: mountain equine mobile veterinary service is a company that provides veterinary care for horses, goats, and other large animals in the asheville area. the company is owned and operated by dr. scott lewis, dvm, who graduated from the university of georgia college of veterinary medicine and completed an internal-medicine and field internship at tufts university/massachusetts equine clinic. dr. lewis takes pride in providing timely, thorough, and compassionate care to horses in the area, offering effective diagnostic and treatment plans for various conditions such as lameness, gi problems, respiratory disease, poor performance, and overall health issues.
